|Title=Know the definition of acute pericarditis
|Description=None
|Rubric=Definition
|Contributors=Jennifer Cautela
|Order=1}}


* Acute inflammation of the leaflets of the pericardium
* Accompanied by pericardial effusion or not ("dry pericarditis")
* If associated with elevated troponin = myopericarditis

properties.question: What is the definition of acute pericarditis?
properties.option_a: Chronic inflammation of the heart muscle
properties.option_b: Inflammation of the outer layer of the heart, possibly with pericardial effusion
properties.option_c: Inflammation of the inner lining of the heart chambers
properties.option_d: Inflammation of the blood vessels supplying the heart
